title: Sticky beef and noodle salad
time: Takes 15 minutes to make, 10 minutes to cook, plus marinating
description: These juicy steaks are marinated in sweet chilli and soy sauce and served with nutty noodle salad and fresh veg.

method.Step 1: Marinate the steak in a bowl with the soy and sweet chilli sauces for 10 minutes. Pour boiling water over the noodles and stand for 4 minutes, then drain and cool under the cold tap.

method.Step 2: Whizz the ginger, garlic, cashews and chilli in a small food processor (or pound in a pestle and mortar) to form a paste. Set aside.

method.Step 3: Heat a griddle or frying pan until very hot. Ensure the steaks are well coated in the marinade, then cook them for 3-4 minutes each side for medium rare (you may need to do this in batches). Set aside to rest.

method.Step 4: Heat the oil in a pan or wok over a medium-high heat and fry the cashew paste for a minute, then add the veg and a splash of water and cook for 2 minutes. Add the noodles and coriander and stir well. Serve the noodles with the sticky beef.
